title: Tadej Pogačar vs The World? Your Ultimate World Championship Men’s Road Race Preview
content:
The contenders, the course, the narratives, the TV guide, and more: Here's all you need to know about the Zürich men's road race on September 29.

Read the full article at Tadej Pogačar vs The World? Your Ultimate World Championship Men’s Road Race Preview on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
